comment_1: now, in these days do people really care what the lyrics are (they should) do you know how many times people reply to his youtube songs saying... he is so cute, hot, a good singer, I love him. It is good that you love him but do you love his songs, not the beat or the music videos, but the meaning of the song, if you understand the meaning of the song, not just one phase, but every world in the song then you should comment on how you love in the song he (as in Justin) is stating that he will put everything in his life to the side just for that special, number one girl!!! I am 13 and I never wrote something so touching like this before!!! :) I only went on this site to see if anyone knew what the meaning of shawty was, if it was like shorty ( as in he likes short girls), or this special girl.
comment_2:
I came on this site to find the meaning of the song.  All I received was a list of comments saying, "I LOVE YOU JUSTINNNN!" I do understand when you create a comment you have the option of Opinion, but seriously, this is a song meanings site.

What does this song mean?  Why is he only saying "I love you" one time?  Why can't he say it more than one time?  Is he embarrassed that she's his girl, so he'll only say he loves her once?  Does it just go along with the motif of "one" in the other lines in the song's chorus? I've read the versus and they just contain meaningless "be my girl" "I like you" "people say we shouldn't be together" nonsense.  It just doesn't make sense at all.  It a another silly love song that just contains blabber. 

I also find it funny that he'll only tell her once, but repeats that he'll tell her once many times. Ha, though he's probably saying that he'll tell her once in that time frame.

comment_10:
I dont understand why people are hateing on the fact he is 15. i could care less i am 18 now and dont you guys remember being 15-16 having your first boyfriend/girlfriend and thinking that you love him/her. i mean if you are saying "this kid dosnt know what love is he wont know till he is 21, when he gets older and sings it this song might actually mean something and be true" Just remember once you were 15-16 and you thought you found love and you never wanted to let that person go. i have been with the same guy since i was 16 and who is to say that he wont find a girl who he will be with for a long time.

to the people who say they find it funny because he says "let me tell you one time" but he repeats it. i think he is saying give me the chance to tell you that i love you, and if you are ok with it i will continue to say it.

"even thought it's a struggle love is all we got
so we gonna keep keep climbin till the mountain top
your world is my world And my fight is your fight
my breath is your breath And your heart" this is my favorit verse. because alot of time love is a struggle but if you care for someone enough you guys will fight till it gets better and i know onece you get to the top it might be slipery but you will over come!

comment_15:
This song is about the death of all reality. I'll dissect all the lyrics:

"Aye, aye, aye, aye, aye, aye, aye, aye."

This is the main protagonist in the songs life cycle. It means that his life's been going on for 8 years, hence the "Aye," 8 times in a row. 

"Me, plus you. Im'a tell you one time
Me, plus you. Im'a tell you one time
Me, plus you. Im'a tell you one time, one time, one time."

(To himself) "Im going to tell you one time, life, that I won't give up on you. I'll survive this tragedy," basically.

"Me, plus you," means "Me, plus myself. I will deal with all this loss,".

"You look so deep, You no that it humbles me
You by my side and troubles them dont trouble me
Many have called but the chosen is you
Whatevery you want shawty I'll give it to you
your world is my world And my fight is your fight
my breath is your breath, And your heart (and now I've got my)"

Pretty much self explanitory after what I just said earlier.

My interpretation of this godawful song.

comment_25:
Okay, you listen now!


I LOVE hard rock. It's a true fact. I listen to Aerosmith, Breaking Benjamin, Three Days Grace, Flyleaf- you name it. Okay. But I also like Justin Bieber. It's the commitment he puts into his music, the way he dances. It makes me feel like I wanna be like him. Young and innocent and free. Look, I've done some things that are "not so good," and this brings me back to when I was younger and innocent like him. It lets me be free again.

And check out his Youtube. :) He takes enough time away from his music to make videos and put them on his channel. It's cool that he understands that he's still a kid, and not some grown-up superstar. That's what I love about him. He's just a normal person like everybody else.

So stop dissing Justin Bieber, even if you HATE his music! I don't particularly like his style, but I love him as a role model. Kids should look up to him.
